testcase.classname: To login as an Inpatient ward successfully.
testcase.name: As a user I want to login as an
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the landing page of the openMRS application................passed When user provides valid Admin and Admin123.................................passed And click on location as Inpatient ward.....................................passed And than click on Login.....................................................passed Then verify that the user logged in as an Inpatient ward....................passed And than user logged out and quits the application successfully.............passed

testcase.classname: To login as an Inpatient ward successfully.
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the landing page of the openMRS application................passed When user provides valid Admin and Admin123.................................passed And click on Isolation ward.................................................passed And than click on Login.....................................................passed Then than click on Register a Patient.......................................passed And than user logged out and quits the application successfully.............passed
